ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.007: Azores, Santa Maria, E coast, Baia de Sao Lorenço; 37°00'N 25°03'W; rocky flat with many holes and tide pools, surr. by sandy beach, algae; shore collecting; 16.ix.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K09: Canary Islands, S coast of Gran Canaria, Arguineguin; 27°45'N 15°40'W; stone, boulders on beach, polluted littoral; ; 6,10.v.1980
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.K15: Cape Verde Islands, SW coast of Ilha de Santa Luzia; 16°45'N 24°46'W; sandy coast; ; 16.vi.1982
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.139: Canary Islands, SW of Palma; 28°39'N 17°58'W; depth 100 m, muddy black sand and shell gravel; van Veen grab; 2.vi.1980
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.038: Canary Islands, S of Lanzarote; 28°48'N 13°46'W; depth 82 m; van Veen grab; 16.v.1980
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.114: Azores, E of Faial; 38°31'N 28°35'W; depth 172 m, sand with shell gravel; Hamon grab; 3.vi.1981
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.020: Azores, E of Formigas; 37°16'N 24°44'W; depth 240-245 m, fine calcareous sand with some shell gravel; van Veen grab; 27.v.1981
Sta. MAU.014: Off Mauritania; 18°50'N 16°21'W; depth 21 m, brownish yellow, somewhat muddy sand; Van Veen grab; 8.vi.1988
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.117: Canary Islands, S of Palma; 28°26'N 17°51'W; depth 503 m, gravel, sand and shells; van Veen grab; 28.v.1980
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.101: Cape Verde Islands, W of Sal, off Palmeira; 16°45'N 23°01'W; depth 262-280 m, calc. sand & gravel, some nodules & Foraminifera; van Veen grab; 30.viii.1986
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.105: Cape Verde Islands, SSW of Santa Luzia; 16°43'N 24°47'W; depth 204 m, foraminifera sand and shell gravel; van Veen grab; 16.vi.1982
